title: New: Sumsun – 2012 EP
content: You might remember a few days ago we brought you the first release from Sumsun’s new 2012 EP; the ethereal house cut, Dance Early. A week later and we’re gifted with the whole EP, a release that holds a healthy infinity with the 80’s new wave, while never being overbearing on the ear. It’s rather kitsch in places, with the synth tones seeming replicated, rather then elegantly explored. This ill feeling for me was short lived, with the effortless composition of each track allowing for an almost seamless flow between every tune, the story twisting and turning with every ebb and flow of the music.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
